situation: A ship with vertical sides near the waterline weighs 40MN including its cargo and has a draft of 6.7 meters in seawater (s.g. = 1.026). Unloading 2 MN of its cargo, the draft decreases to 6.4m. With its cargo reduced, the ship enters a harbor of fresh water. Evaluate the draft of the ship in fresh water, in meters.
